languages.text: "Тогда он должен был умолять, а не бунтовать! Явиться ко мне, встать на колени и молить о снисхождении! Тогда милость была возможна, но не сейчас! Мятеж против властей — это мятеж против Него!"

traits.locale_text: "Тогда он должен был умолять, а не бунтовать! Явиться ко мне, встать на колени и молить о снисхождении!" {n}Инцендия решительно рубит рукой воздух.{/n} "Тогда милость была возможна, но не сейчас! Мятеж против властей — это мятеж против Него!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Then he should have pleaded, not rebelled! He should have come to me, knelt before me, and begged for leniency! Mercy was possible then, but not now! To rebel against authority is to rebel against Him!"
languages.original_text: "Тогда он должен был умолять, а не бунтовать! Явиться ко мне, встать на колени и молить о снисхождении! Тогда милость была возможна, но не сейчас! Мятеж против властей — это мятеж против Него!"

traits.locale_text: "Then he should have pleaded, not rebelled! He should have come to me, knelt before me, and begged for leniency! Mercy was possible then, but not now! To rebel against authority is to rebel against Him!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Then he should have pleaded, not rebelled! He should have come to me, knelt before me, and begged for leniency! Mercy was possible then, but not now! To rebel against authority is to rebel against Him!"

traits.locale_text: "Then he should have pleaded, not rebelled! He should have come to me, knelt before me, and begged for leniency! Mercy was possible then, but not now! To rebel against authority is to rebel against Him!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Then he should have pleaded, not rebelled! He should have come to me, knelt before me, and begged for leniency! Mercy was possible then, but not now! To rebel against authority is to rebel against Him!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “那他本该恳求我，不该聚众造反！他本该来找我，跪在我面前，乞求宽大处理！那个时候我说不定还会仁慈地解决这件事情，可现在想都别想！反对帝国合法当局，就是在反对帝皇！”
languages.original_text: "Then he should have pleaded, not rebelled! He should have come to me, knelt before me, and begged for leniency! Mercy was possible then, but not now! To rebel against authority is to rebel against Him!"

traits.locale_text: “那他本该恳求我，不该聚众造反！他本该来找我，跪在我面前，乞求宽大处理！那个时候我说不定还会仁慈地解决这件事情，可现在想都别想！反对帝国合法当局，就是在反对帝皇！”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「ならば、祈りをささげるべきだった。反逆するのではなくな！私の前に来て跪き、慈悲を乞うべきだった！そうしていれば慈悲を与えることも可能だったが、もう遅い！権威に反抗することは、主に反抗することだ！」
languages.original_text: "Then he should have pleaded, not rebelled! He should have come to me, knelt before me, and begged for leniency! Mercy was possible then, but not now! To rebel against authority is to rebel against Him!"

traits.locale_text: 「ならば、祈りをささげるべきだった。反逆するのではなくな！私の前に来て跪き、慈悲を乞うべきだった！そうしていれば慈悲を与えることも可能だったが、もう遅い！権威に反抗することは、主に反抗することだ！」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «¡Entonces debería haber suplicado en vez de haberse rebelado! ¡Debería haberse arrodillado ante mí y haberme suplicado clemencia! La clemencia era posible antes, ¡pero no ahora! Rebelarse contra la autoridad es rebelarse contra Él».
languages.original_text: "Then he should have pleaded, not rebelled! He should have come to me, knelt before me, and begged for leniency! Mercy was possible then, but not now! To rebel against authority is to rebel against Him!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Entonces debería haber suplicado en vez de haberse rebelado! ¡Debería haberse arrodillado ante mí y haberme suplicado clemencia! La clemencia era posible antes, ¡pero no ahora! Rebelarse contra la autoridad es rebelarse contra Él».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Dann hätte er flehen sollen, nicht rebellieren! Er hätte zu mir kommen sollen, sich vor mir auf die Knie werfen, und um Milde betteln! Damals war Gnade möglich, nun nicht mehr! Gegen die Autoritäten zu rebellieren, heißt gegen den Imperator zu rebellieren!"
languages.original_text: "Then he should have pleaded, not rebelled! He should have come to me, knelt before me, and begged for leniency! Mercy was possible then, but not now! To rebel against authority is to rebel against Him!"

traits.locale_text: "Dann hätte er flehen sollen, nicht rebellieren! Er hätte zu mir kommen sollen, sich vor mir auf die Knie werfen, und um Milde betteln! Damals war Gnade möglich, nun nicht mehr! Gegen die Autoritäten zu rebellieren, heißt gegen den Imperator zu rebellieren!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Si mes méthodes ne lui convenaient pas, il aurait dû m'implorer au lieu de se rebeller ! Il aurait dû se présenter devant moi, s'agenouiller et me supplier de me montrer clémente ! Alors, j'aurais pu faire preuve d'indulgence, mais plus maintenant. Se révolter contre l'autorité revient à se révolter contre l'Empereur ! »
languages.original_text: "Then he should have pleaded, not rebelled! He should have come to me, knelt before me, and begged for leniency! Mercy was possible then, but not now! To rebel against authority is to rebel against Him!"

traits.locale_text: « Si mes méthodes ne lui convenaient pas, il aurait dû m'implorer au lieu de se rebeller ! Il aurait dû se présenter devant moi, s'agenouiller et me supplier de me montrer clémente ! Alors, j'aurais pu faire preuve d'indulgence, mais plus maintenant. Se révolter contre l'autorité revient à se révolter contre l'Empereur ! »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Öyleyse isyan etmek yerine açıklamada bulunmalıydı! Bana gelmeli, önümde diz çökmeli ve hoşgörü dilemeliydi! O zaman merhamet mümkün olabilirdi! Şimdi değil ama! Otoriteye başkaldırma, O'na başkaldırmadır!"
languages.original_text: "Then he should have pleaded, not rebelled! He should have come to me, knelt before me, and begged for leniency! Mercy was possible then, but not now! To rebel against authority is to rebel against Him!"

traits.locale_text: "Öyleyse isyan etmek yerine açıklamada bulunmalıydı! Bana gelmeli, önümde diz çökmeli ve hoşgörü dilemeliydi! O zaman merhamet mümkün olabilirdi! Şimdi değil ama! Otoriteye karşı başkaldırma, O'na karşı başkaldırmadır!"
traits.speaker: Chorda
